question: Which river divides the city of Toruń, Poland into two parts?
asked_question_translated: Hvilken elv deler byen Toruń i Polen i to deler?
answer: Elven Wisła (Vistula) deler byen Toruń i Polen i to deler.
answer_translated_eng: The river Wisła (Vistula) divides the city of Toruń in Poland into two parts.
